Older unit, but very charming.
Easy to get to with ample parking out front.
Location worked out well for us and was near convenience stores.

very nice place ....not completely perfect because the beds are a little old and the cleanliness under them should be better, there was a lot of dust behind the furniture in the room and a very ugly smell of cigarette with cat manure in the courtyard of the steps was very penetrating and unpleasant.
100% recomendable! Nice place
Great stay while traveling to D.C. Everything was great.

Jason's place was like home away from home! The instructions for check-in were easy, parking was ample and the space was very comfortable. The apartment is well-appointed, with everything you need for your stay- including comfy beds, clean towels, linens, a spacious bathroom and nice furniture. Jason was very accommodating to my request and I will highly recommend his place to friends staying in this beautiful, historic area.

My friend and I recently stayed at this antique and beautiful location and we have absolutely no regrets! The host was extremely friendly and responsive. I attempted to reach out to him via text message, but it didn't go through. However, when I contacted him through Airbnb messaging, he was quick to respond. I highly recommend this location to everyone! We felt very welcome and at home. Thank you, Jason, for making our stay so enjoyable!

I've stayed at Jason's place twice now and both times were wonderful visits. The place is always clean, it's absolutely beautiful and always clean and free of clutter and it is within walking distance of multiple restaurants and the city park. I've staying there, and it is definitely worth every penny! Thank you, Jason!

We loved how quiet the space was, and how peaceful the space was. We were in town for a Roller Derby bout so the nice bathtub and shower accommodations were perfect! If you don‚Äôt mind stairs we highly recommend Jason‚Äôs place! Get your steps in, and then relax in this great AirBnB!

I really enjoyed my stay here. I think Jason was super proactive and communicative. I will say I got a ‚Äúwe hope you had a nice stay‚Äù message through Airbnb before our stay so that was a bit confusing. Jason was super accommodating when I realized I forgot something at the Airbnb and he let me grab it after check out. A couple of things I didn‚Äôt expect were the cigarette smell in the building common space (not the unit itself). Of course it‚Äôs an old building so it‚Äôs not out of the ordinary. I was also worried about parking due to not having a dedicated space but that wasn‚Äôt an issue at all. There were spaces in front of the building. Figuring out the heat/a/c in each of the rooms was a bit challenging since each room was controlled separately. And lastly while the towels that were provided were obviously cleaned, they were slightly stained - which made me a bit apprehensive to use them. Overall we enjoyed our stay and would recommend this Airbnb to others!
Wonderful host. Loved the amenities. Super responsive

The condo was exactly as described! It had all the amenities listed and more! Very clean and private - you have all of the top floor to yourself. Jason even worked with us for a later checkout time, which was super super convenient and very helpful!
Loved the vibe, great communication, fun layout, and nestled at the top of a beautiful building atop a slight hill.

It's a beautiful place. It's unfortunately on the top floor so you have to climb up 4 flights of stairs which my kids hated and the floor is very creaky because it's an older style house. I wouldn't recommend younger kids as mine wanted to run around a lot and we were afraid of disturbing the tenants under us with the creaky floor. All and all everything was clean. We stayed a week which was a long trip and there are heaters thankfully in each room because it was rather chilly out.
I absolutely loved it. It was nice and clean and I absolutely loved the porch and the bathroom. It was outstanding!!

We came into town to see our daughter and we wanted a place that had a good location, amenities to cook, 2 bedrooms and lots of space and this condo was PERFECT!! We were able to hang out with our family, cook meals, play games and relax in this spacious space. It was clean, packed with everything we needed and even had a balcony with a view. It was located in a nice area, close to downtown. We visit Hagerstown often and we will be back and will stay here!

The place was perfect and I really enjoyed the couple of days I was able to stay. The apartment was beautiful! The bathroom and kitchen were absolutely beautiful and the bed was comfortable! 100 percent recommend!

The only thing I must say is that the apartment is on the fourth floor and the post does not say it and there are no elevators to raise luggage and difficult access for people over 65 years of age with disabilities
Very nice one night stay:)

Charming but cold‚Ä¶ loved the place but had issues with the heat. (I keep my old house at 68 and it was much colder than that.) Host called HVAC but I found out from them that the issues had previously been reported. Recommend getting confirmation that the heat works well and that the noisy bedroom unit has been fixed (another guest 5 months ago had reported that issue and it hadn‚Äôt been fixed). Otherwise, this was a great place - cute, charming, quiet, and close enough to restaurants to walk.
It was a lovely apartment. The beds were comfortable and there were plenty of towels. Easy parking. Guests should be aware, before booking, of the 4 flights of stairs!

We felt right at home when we arrived at Jason's beautifully-decorated apartment! It was well-appointed, super clean and had easy check-in. Because we were attending a show at Maryland Theater, it was super walkable and we found a nice selection of restaurants near the theater. The street on which the apartment is located had many beautiful, historic homes and churches making a stroll down the street enjoyable. The covered back porch with a view was a nice surprise.
Very nice place.
Charming apartment on a quiet one-way street and close enough to walk to many restaurants. We loved our quick getaway to explore a new town.
We love this apartment and plan to stay here every time we are in town visiting family.

The premise was great. Clean and well maintained. The amenities were great. I really like the old fashioned deep bath tub.
The location appeared to be safe overall, but occasionally there were people in the area who you need to be careful.
Overall I recommend this place (good for the money)
Very good for a getaway that feels like home . Very clean and lots of great amenities
Cute place and conveniently located.
The house was clean, the communication was good and also the location. We liked the experience

I‚Äôm a returning guest and would definitely recommend. Very clean, tidy & comfortable furnishings. Jason was very responsive when I needed to reached out about a concern & made sure all our needs were met. I‚Äôm sure we will return again.
Enjoyed our stay. Very comfortable, clean with magazine style decor. We felt right at home and comfortable.
Jason was excellent. Handled a minor issue immediately. Very polite and helpful. I recommend this location to anyone. It will not disappoint.
OK

Jason provided thorough information and details before our stay, which was great! There was plenty of parking directly in front of the house, we never had an issue finding a spot anytime we left and came back. The stairs were fine for us but I could see how some folks might have a tough time, there were quite a few staircases to climb. No issues getting into the building or the unit itself. Upon entering the unit, we notice that the floors weren't very clean, it seems that the housekeeper(s) might need to focus more on that, it look like it hadn't been swept at all and rugs not vacuumed. Otherwise the place seemed to be clean. Shower was nice and roomy and no issues with water pressure during our stay. Was kind of surprised to not find any paper towel provided in the kitchen or tissues anywhere either. Beds were comfortable enough but the AC units in the bedrooms were pretty noisy, we ended up just not using them. Overall, a good stay, but some minor things that could be improved upon.

My sister and I came to Hagerstown to see my father and really enjoyed staying at Jason's. It had a lot of room and was very clean. Great location too. An issue with the TV was solved by quick communication with Jason. We will stay there again.
Jason‚Äôs place was very comfortable an peaceful. He‚Äôs a great host very responsive I would definitely book his place again when I‚Äôm in town
Just as pictured, clean, quiet and comfortable.
Will stay again soon. Not too bad
Excellent host always responded to all our needs. We wanted to stay there longer but ours got ahead of us. Many thanks to the host!! We would definitely choose this home again.

Centrally located, excellent shower/bath. Many televisions w/ cable, lots of towels, fully stocked kitchen, comfy couch. Excellent place. I would like to return to enjoy all its comforts. Thank you Jason for so much kindness.
Jason‚Äôs unit is spacious, very clean, comfortable beds, fully equipped kitchen - everything needed for a restful night on the road.
we enjoyed our stay. easy to get to. close to the event we were attending. quiet neighborhood.

I had a very good stay. I will visit again.

My home away from home.
Thank you Jason
Great location walkable to several restaurants.

I had a great stay at this listing. The host, Jason, was responsive and provided clear instructions prior to my arrival so most of my questions were already answered. The place itself was spotless and well prepared for my arrival. 10/10 would recommend.

The apartment is nicely decorated. Everything provided that was needed. Jason responds with any questions quickly. The beds are super comfortable! Love the shower! Great water pressure. Incredible place for what you're paying. Book now!
I was very last min with this reservation. Jason did awesome with making things go smooth on very short notice. I appreciate his efforts.
Great place- would definitely stay again
Great place and great host! We loved the character and feel of the condo. Highly recommend.

Great place, beautiful decorations, love the two person shower.

Jason was such a great and responsive host. When we couldn‚Äôt figure out how to turn one of his heaters on, he purchased one and it arrived within an hour! That really impressed us! Thank you for the great place & simple check-in & check-put process. Would 100% recommend!
A lovely, quiet get-away.
The place and the room is nice
The condo was comfortable and cozy! It was exactly as described. My family frequents the area and we would stay there again. The cost of staying was a rare find and very affordable.

Jason's place is super spacious and well furnished. The bed was oh so comfy, too!

Good location and clean

I enjoyed my stay and the place was clean and very comfy.
Cute little place. I loved the ambience of the area. Easy peasy check in!
looking forward to seeing you soon

My guest and I enjoyed our stay overall. Beautiful and neat condo with a decent view of the surrounding area with a patio on the roof. Kitchen has all the basic necessities required to cook, if you wish. You plenty of different things to go do within driving or within walking distance. Overall an amazing place to stay.
Great access to downtown.

The directions for checking in were extremely clear and easy to follow. The space was comforting and felt as if I were home. There were plenty of toiletries available for myself and my little ones. I enjoyed the outside seating space for late night book reads and for quiet time after everyone was asleep. I will definitely book this space again during my future travels to Mercersburg.

My family were in town looking for a new home and while in town searching we stayed at Jason‚Äôs place. Wow factor is is under statement. It‚Äôs so comfortable and accommodating. You will not be disappointed staying here.
It was a nice place and a beautiful street. The stairs aren't bad, after we reserved I was told it was a 4 floor walk up but it is really 3, they are just broken down weird.
Historic condo walking distance from beautiful city park.
Great stay! Perfect location and had everything I needed. Would return again!

It was very clean, comfortable and cozy, we will be back to stay here again.
Thanks for the great hospitality!
absolute fantastic. loved all the details like coffee and soaps!

Jason‚Äôs place was perfect, it‚Äôs bigger than in pictures for sure. The two bedrooms were a perfect size for my family it‚Äôs very clean and very pretty. The place is very well updated, would definitely consider staying here again. Jason was very responsive and kept us well communicated.

Hello Jason, we loved our stay in Hagerstown and really enjoyed the beautiful old building we got to stay in. You have it very nicely decorated and well stocked...it made us feel right at home We noticed that the light in the shower didn't work as well as the string lights on the back porch. Heather

This Air BNB was amazing, the property and condo was way more for the money!!!! Our party were in town for a wedding, the view was fantastic. As a larger guy I decided to go with the stairs and they were no issue, and we're way less stairs than imagined
Jason was a wonderful host. Being very responsive in times of questions and kind. The place was cool to stay and neighborhood was quiet and clean.
Space is huge- bigger than pictures show. Both rooms could fit a pack n play. It is a walk up but stairs are very wide. Living spaces are updated and nice.

The air bnb itself was lovely- super cute and clean. Water pressure was very low. The shower heads worked well, but it took a little to fill the tub since the pressure was so low. Same with the sinks in the bathroom and kitchen. Basically a trickle so it made it hard to wash dishes. Also very uneasy feeling throughout the air bnb. The street it was on was okay, but down the hill (about 500 feet), the area wasn't very safe. Cameras were put on the outside of the doors and I wasn't notified of those, as well as not being notified that there was a fire escape that led straight to the street. Anyone could've had access to the air bnb if they wanted. I was also not notified that the air bnb is on the 3rd floor of the building. Lastly, there was a Nest "security system" (thats what it was called when I looked it up) that would reconfigure every once in a while and I was not notified of that either. Lastly, this is a little picky, but the tvs were not connected to wifi so cable was the only option. I do recommend this spot, but do wish I was told about the above things.
Jason‚Äôs home was big & comfy & had all the proper items needed to enjoy my stay. 5 stars ‚≠êÔ∏è

The hosts have done a wonderful job of providing modern amenities to this jewel of a historic era home. Nearly ever convenience was at our finger tips and the hosts made sure access and communication was simple and prompt. The unit was quick to cool which was important as we visited in the hottest part of the year.
A great apartment and good communication with the owner
Great place to stay in town, historic space and plenty of room.

This was a great place for us to stay while in town for a weekend event. The location is In a beautiful part of historic Hagerstown. This building/unit had so much character with all of the modern amenities needed for our stay.

Jason's place was wonderful and exactly as advertised. We've stayed at several AirBNBs over the years and so far, this has been our favorite place. We just stopped for a night, but were impressed by the cleanliness and amenities for the price. We loved having access to a full kitchen, and felt that there were hotel like touches (personal soaps/shampoo, availability to make delicious coffee!) We loved going to the Hagerstown City Park. It was so beautiful, and only a four minute drive. (I believe you could walk there as well.) We took our young toddler there and she played at the awesome playgrounds, but it was lovely just to walk around the pond as well. We even caught a rehearsal for the Hagerstown Municipal Band while we were there. I would highly recommend Jason's place if you are spending some time in Hagerstown.
Great modern space. Good A/C. Easy parking. Great value

Pictures are deceiving. No water pressure in kitchen sink and sink in bathroom. Both showers do not work only the far one in picture. Bath tub does not have any cold water and hot only comes out in a trickle. So all the things I looked forward to enjoying did not work. Great location and overall place. we enjoyed our stay.

This place was awesome! Very clean and nice looking with every amenity that you may need. The only drawback would be that if you are unable to do stairs, this might not work out for you, but for me it was fine. I got a little winded over the four short flights but all that said was I need to do more cardio! Lol!
Overall, this was great stay and the host was fantastic. I highly recommend you to book this. I will on my future visits to Hagerstown!
Street parking but we were able to park very close and easily each time. Charming building. Comfortable apartment. Would stay again.
Cute little place in a gorgeous old building. Plenty of parking right in front. Very clean. Comfy bed and great heat /AC system.

We enjoyed staying at this place in Hagerstown. We knew it was a historic building, and expected the sounds and smells of an older building, but it was nicely renovated and very comfortable. The main living area was nice and open, and the bathroom was a nice size. Being on the top floor did mean there were steps to climb, but there were no other rooms on the same floor, so it was pretty quiet. I would only ask that the water pressure be checked to see if it can be adjusted, but overall we had a really nice time.

This house is an absolute gem! I audibly gasped several times when walking through, especially when I saw the bathroom. Nice place
Nice location
Very convenient

Great place to stay at!

Beautiful, bright, clean, historical, rich character, and romantic.

fantastic! so to have a luxury place to stay in downtown Hagerstown!
Place was cute and in a good location.

Overall a decent to good stay however there are some things that need fixed/ worked on. I would check with the host to see if these things got addressed before booking. The water pressure in the kitchen is especially bad if you are planning on using the kitchen a decent amount and needing to wash dishes. The bath tub in the picture wasn't usable because only the hot water worked and it also didn't have good water pressure. The shower has 2 faucet heads and only one of them worked. This wasn't a huge deal since we really only needed one to work but its not great to be advertised and then not work. The couches really could be updated because you sank way down into them, seem like they have had their wear. On a good note Jason was very responsive and check in and out was super easy. The location was great. We walked to a small grocery store and to one of the local restaurants. There were other good restaurants in walking distance that we didn't get to try and i could see that once there is a little warmer weather it would be a fun city to check out more. I did not mind that we had to climb 4 sets of stairs to get in our room, the stair sets were pretty short and didn't take long to get to the top. I had seen someone mention in their review about the smell of the place. Being that it is an old Historic building that was remodeled i understand its hard to have a new place smell. Jason did have 1 or 2 air purifiers running that was nice. There still was a slight smell but being that i worked there during the day i got used to it and it didn't bother me. It was nice having the whole place to ourselves and for the price if the few things i mentioned would get fixed i would say it would be a good place for anyone who isn't crazy bothered by old building smells to stay. Also forgot to mention that we got to park right outside of the building every day so that made it super easy as well especially for unloading and loading our stuff .
Place was very nice and clean, bed was comfy, location was great
Spacious and well kept! High quality furniture, kitchen, and bathroom!

Great place to stay! Went for a work trip and enjoyed the feeling of being home over a hotel. Accommodations are exactly as shown, check in was prompt and easy. The small details and natural light make it a welcoming stay.
We enjoyed our stay for a girls weekend in January 2022. The building was older but unique and comfortable. Jason was a responsive host.

What a beautifully remodeled apartment! Loved the coziness and gorgeous kitchen.

Would surely recommend.
The place is clean and safe. You can enjoy your vacation there and have fun with friends. It is the place that we want to visit again.
Jason's condo was a great choice for us. The whole experience went well.
Great place! Highly recommend.
beautiful apartment, great amenities, and very clean. thank you!
Great spot, right in the middle of Hagerstown where you want to be. Very cool historic building!
We had a fantastic stay.. Everything was it was as it said on the app, check in was easy and the place was lovely!

Jason had Great accommodations! I have stayed numerous times, very thoughtful with extra special touches.
My favorite place to stay. You have to book ahead, goes fast.

Jason‚Äôs property is lovely, and in a great location. The building has historic character, and the apartment is modern and clean. Best of both worlds. Parking was never an issue. The spots in front were always open. We enjoyed walking around the historic neighborhood. Very nice!
Jason was excellent in his communications and hospitality!
What a great host. Excellent rapid replies to my communication. Well stocked kitchen and warm and comfort space. Thank you so much. This is a very thoughtful and well cared for space and host.
There was an issue upon arrival but it was immediately resolved. Beautiful space.

This is an incredible space and a perfect location. I strongly recommend choosing this opportunity if you‚Äôre looking for a cozy weekend away. Jason is extremely responsive and an amazing host. I‚Äôd strongly recommend using any of his services.

We love staying at Jason's place in Hagerstown. It is so nice and close to everything we love to do while we are there. He is a great host. He answers all questions very quickly. I dont have anything negative to say.

We had a great time!
great place to get ur thoughts together

great place!

Overall, this rental has promise but is need of a deep clean and maintenance. Also, we did not feel safe in this location. We‚Äôre a family of 4 traveling with grade school kids.
I thought the location would allow for walkability to local cafes, restaurants, etc. The location is technically walkable but we didn‚Äôt feel safe walking the handful of blocks and drove for everything. I‚Äôm not sure if the neighborhood has been impacted due to Covid and businesses closing, etc.
The interior is renovated but the building itself is very old. We found decor broken and not hung. Also, we found water damage where paint was peeling off the ceiling and next to a window in the living area. The fire alarm was also removed from the kitchen which was a safety concern. We were right next to lots of shops, restaurants, and a unique art walk just five minutes away. Definitely would book again!
This was a wonderful place to stay! It had everything you would need and was very clean upon arrival. Jason was an excellent host!
